Everything you were told is a lie.

Un-Hoaxing

Un-Hoaxing is a collection of videos that debunk the most stubborn hoaxes of the left. (Yes, hoaxes of the right exist, but that's for others to create a website.) The videos are chosen to be brief as possible but convincing. The goal is to break the narrative propagated by the state and media.
